Question
========
Which statement about forks is correct?

Answerlist
----------
* A fork deletes the original repository
* A fork is your personal copy of a public repository
* A fork can only be created by repository owners
* A fork prevents you from making any changes

Solution
========
Forks let you create your own copy of a public repository and make changes without permission.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* True
* False
* False
